titleInfo.title: Interview - Ray Martin and Lance LeRoy - 2005-10-25

mods.abstract: Interview with Ray Martin and Lance LeRoy from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 25, 2005. Interview conducted by Eddie Stubbs following screening of the documentary film King of Bluegrass: The Life and Times of Jimmy Martin

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
